abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Radiance Ability TypeHeal Uranus absorbs the energy generated by incoming attacks to strengthen himself, regenerating a certain amount of HP every 0.8s. Each stack lasts 10s. When at max stacks (20), Uranus regenerates 48-224 HP (scales with level).

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Ionic Edge Ability TypeAOE Slow DamageMagic Base Cooldown: 4.0 Base Mana Cost: 60 Uranus releases two energy blades that orbit around him, dealing 155 (+30%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemy targets and slowing them by 30% for 2s. Each time this skill deals damage to a target, they will be marked with a stack for 6s (max of 1 stack per target per cast). Each stack increases the damage of this skill by 40% (to a max of 320%). Each energy blade will only deal damage to the same target once.

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Transcendent Ward Ability TypeMobility Shield DamageMagic Base Cooldown: 10.0 Base Mana Cost: 80 Uranus charges to the target location, dealing 80 (+20%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies along the way, and 160 (+80%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies at the target location and slowing them by 25%. Uranus also generates a 300 (+200%Total Magic Power) shield for 4s. The shield explodes at the end of its duration or when destroyed, dealing 300 (+150%Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies nearby.

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Consecration Ability TypeBuff Speed Up Base Cooldown: 42.0 Base Mana Cost: 100 Uranus unleashes the energy stored within his body, removing slow effects on himself, recovering 200 HP, and gaining 60% Movement Speed for 8s (decays over time). Uranus directly gains 5 stacks of Radiance, increasing shields received and HP Regen by 20% for 8s.
